message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  I believe it's a great deal for you considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product. Let's make a deal!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,250. Can you consider that?
